remarks: The preimage of any set open in the subspace topology of the range of the function is measurable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
mbfimaopn.1 $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
mbfimaopn2.2 $e |- K = ( J |`t B ) $.
mbfimaopn2 $p |- ( ( ( F e. MblFn /\ F : A --> B /\ B C_ CC ) /\ C e. K ) -> ( `' F " C ) e. dom vol ) $.
